Articles of Association

OpenWIS® AISBL is governed according to its Articles of Association. An English translation of the current version of these Articles is provided below.

  • DEED OF INCORPORATION OF THE International Non-Profit Organization OpenWIS Association

  • PREAMBLE

  • ARTICLE 1: NAME

  • ARTICLE 2: PURPOSE

  • ARTICLE 3: REGISTERED OFFICE

  • ARTICLE 4: MEMBERS

  • ARTICLE 5: INTERNAL RULES

  • ARTICLE 6: ADMISSION OF NEW MEMBERS

  • ARTICLE 7: RESIGNATION OF A MEMBER

  • ARTICLE 8: EXCLUSION OF A MEMBER

  • ARTICLE 9: ORGANIZATIONAL PARTNERS AND RELATIONSHIP WITH OTHER THIRD PARTIES

  • ARTICLE 10: MEMBERSHIP CONTRIBUTIONS, SUBSCRIPTIONS, FEES AND ADDITONAL FINANCE

  • ARTICLE 11: MANAGEMENT STRUCTURE

  • ARTICLE 12: BOARD

  • ARTICLE 13: STEERING COMMITTEE

  • ARTICLE 14: TECHNICAL COMMITTEE

  • ARTICLE 15: FINANCIAL YEAR - ANNUAL ACCOUNTS

  • ARTICLE 16: DISPUTES

  • ARTICLE 17: ENTRY INTO FORCE

  • ARTICLE 18: DURATION

  • ARTICLE 19: LANGUAGE

  • ARTICLE 20: AMENDMENT

  • ARTICLE 21: LIMITED LIABILITY

  • ARTICLE 22: COMPETENT COURT

  • ARTICLE 23: FINAL DISPOSITION

As stated in ARTICLE 20.1, these Articles of Association may be changed by unanimous decision of the Board. Approved versions of the Articles of Association are listed below, most recent first:

  • First approved version in French (PDF) and English (PDF), as adopted by the Board Meeting of 6 February 2015 in Melbourne, Australia
  • OpenWIS Association AISBL
  • contact@openwis.io
